   It's used in `FindOpenSSL.cmake` provided by CMake: https://cmake.org/cmake/help/latest/module/FindOpenSSL.html#hints

kou commented on issue #5961: ARROW-7315: [Python] Remove unused cmake flag from wheel scripts 
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5961#issuecomment-561901925
 
 
   How about this?
   
   ```diff
   diff --git a/python/manylinux1/build_arrow.sh b/python/manylinux1/build_arrow.sh
   index bf12da56c..a4971be32 100755
   --- a/python/manylinux1/build_arrow.sh
   +++ b/python/manylinux1/build_arrow.sh
   @@ -66,11 +66,13 @@ PIP="${CPYTHON_PATH}/bin/pip"
    # Put our Python first to avoid picking up an antiquated Python from CMake
    PATH="${CPYTHON_PATH}/bin:${PATH}"
    
   +CMAKE_ARGS=""
    if [ "${PYTHON_VERSION}" != "2.7" ]; then
      export PYARROW_WITH_FLIGHT=1
      export PYARROW_WITH_GANDIVA=1
      export BUILD_ARROW_FLIGHT=ON
      export BUILD_ARROW_GANDIVA=ON
   +  CMAKE_ARGS="${CMAKE_ARGS} -DOPENSSL_USE_STATIC_LIBS=ON"
    else
      # Flight and Gandiva are not supported on Python 2.7
      export PYARROW_WITH_FLIGHT=0
   @@ -114,7 +116,7 @@ cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \
        -DARROW_GANDIVA_JAVA=OFF \
        -DBoost_NAMESPACE=arrow_boost \
        -DBOOST_ROOT=/arrow_boost_dist \
   -    -DOPENSSL_USE_STATIC_LIBS=ON \
   +    ${CMAKE_ARGS} \
        -GNinja /arrow/cpp
    ninja
    ninja install
   diff --git a/python/manylinux2010/build_arrow.sh b/python/manylinux2010/build_arrow.sh
   index a6ce49ac0..34ea25229 100755
   --- a/python/manylinux2010/build_arrow.sh
   +++ b/python/manylinux2010/build_arrow.sh
   @@ -65,11 +65,13 @@ PYTHON_INTERPRETER="${CPYTHON_PATH}/bin/python"
    PIP="${CPYTHON_PATH}/bin/pip"
    PATH="${PATH}:${CPYTHON_PATH}"
    
   +CMAKE_ARGS=""
    if [ "${PYTHON_VERSION}" != "2.7" ]; then
      export PYARROW_WITH_FLIGHT=1
      export PYARROW_WITH_GANDIVA=1
      export BUILD_ARROW_FLIGHT=ON
      export BUILD_ARROW_GANDIVA=ON
   +  CMAKE_ARGS="${CMAKE_ARGS} -DOPENSSL_USE_STATIC_LIBS=ON"
    else
      # Flight and Gandiva are not supported on Python 2.7
      export PYARROW_WITH_FLIGHT=0
   @@ -115,7 +117,7 @@ PATH="${CPYTHON_PATH}/bin:${PATH}" cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \
        -DARROW_GANDIVA_JAVA=OFF \
        -DBoost_NAMESPACE=arrow_boost \
        -DBOOST_ROOT=/arrow_boost_dist \
   -    -DOPENSSL_USE_STATIC_LIBS=ON \
   +    ${CMAKE_ARGS} \
        -GNinja /arrow/cpp
    ninja install
    popd
   ```
   
   `FindOpenSSL.cmake` is used only when we enable Flight.
   
   I think that we always need this flag on macOS. Because we always enable Flight on macOS.
   Did you see the warning on macOS?
